name: Facebook Instagram Ad Templates
description:
Create exportable ads for Instagram and Facebook and see them in context on the mobile application.


 SETUP  .

  1. Drop Logo into logo box
  2. Set elements to “Scale” in logo box
  3. Replace “Your Name” with your company name


 HOW TO MAKE NEW AD SET 

  1. Have this file open as well as  another file you wish to create ads in
  2. Select these components →
  3. Copy
  4. Paste where into your working file
  5. In working file Ad image and  text to Ad (not ad preview)
  6. Export Ad (not preview)



  TROUBLE SHOOTING

 If youre preview is warped click the ad in the

preview and right click “reset component”


   DO NOT 

  1. Edit previews
  2. Duplicate ad sets in your file.  Components must be copied from this  file and dropped into a new file everytime or your preview will break. (see step 1)
